article.title: Lockheed Martin to Modernize Long Range Radars
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation, Liverpool, New York, is being awarded a $26,197,869 firm-fixed-price, cost-reimbursable no fee, time-and-material contract for funding action and exercise of options for modernization of 29 AN/FPS-117 long range radars via the essential parts replacement program. Ogden Air Logistics Center, Hill Air Force Base, Utah, is the contracting activity.
